text: The actress, who will be honored at Tuesday's Costume Designer Guild Awards, talks about Olivia Pope's look and what it was like to wear Anita Hill's turquoise suit in'Confirmation': It ` ` really felt like armor.'' Now in its seventh and final season, ABC's Scandal redefined the look of female power dressing in Washington, D. C., with Olivia Pope's powdery pastel pantsuits, statement coats and designer handbags inspiring fashion fans every week. So it's only fitting that the show's star, Kerry Washington, be honored with the Costume Designers Guild's Spotlight Award.
